requirement: The system shall automatically trigger a database rollback sequence if the primary ledger fails to acknowledge the transaction commit within 500ms of the request initiation.
The application must maintain a standard response time of under 200ms for 99% of all API requests when the concurrent user load is below 10,000 users.

Upon detection of a discrepancy between the local cache and the server state, the client application shall force a full data synchronization to resolve the conflict before allowing further user input.
All sensitive user data, including PII and PHI, must be encrypted at rest using AES-256 standard encryption keys managed by a centralized Hardware Security Module (HSM).
The algorithmic trading module shall execute a sell order immediately if the moving average convergence divergence (MACD) indicator crosses below the signal line while the RSI is above 70.
The system availability must be at least 99.99% during business hours (08:00 to 18:00 EST), allowing for a maximum of 52 minutes of downtime per year.
When a user uploads a document, the system must parse the metadata to extract the author and creation date, and then index these fields in the search engine within 10 seconds.
The user interface must be fully navigable using only a keyboard, adhering to WCAG 2.1 Level AA accessibility standards for focus management and contrast ratios.

If the external payment gateway returns a '503 Service Unavailable' error, the system shall retry the transaction up to three times with an exponential backoff strategy before marking the payment as failed.
The software must be capable of recovering from a catastrophic server failure within 15 minutes (RTO) with no more than 5 minutes of data loss (RPO).
The inventory management subsystem shall automatically generate a purchase order for restocking when the quantity of a specific SKU falls below the dynamically calculated reorder point.
The API documentation must be automatically generated from the code annotations and exposed via a Swagger UI that is accessible only to authenticated developers.
The authentication service must support multi-factor authentication (MFA) using Time-based One-Time Passwords (TOTP) and must reject any code that has been used previously.
The system must support horizontal scaling to handle a 300% sudden increase in traffic volume without manual intervention or service degradation.
When a new patient record is created, the system shall cross-reference the Master Patient Index (MPI) to identify potential duplicates based on fuzzy matching of name and date of birth.
The mobile application binary size must not exceed 50MB to ensure downloadability over low-bandwidth cellular networks in emerging markets.
The workflow engine must allow administrators to define custom approval chains where a request is routed to a specific manager based on the department code and total expense amount.
All system logs must be retained for a minimum of seven years in an immutable WORM (Write Once, Read Many) storage format to comply with Sarbanes-Oxley regulations.
The recommendation engine shall filter out any products that the user has previously purchased or explicitly marked as 'not interested' within the last 30 days.
The codebase must maintain a test coverage of at least 85% across all modules, and the CI/CD pipeline must block any deployment that lowers this metric.
If the temperature sensor reports a value exceeding 80Â°C, the embedded controller must immediately shut down the heating element and activate the cooling fan.
The system architecture must be modular, ensuring that the replacement of the database layer does not require changes to the business logic layer code.
The search functionality shall support Boolean operators (AND, OR, NOT) and wildcards to allow users to construct complex queries against the document repository.
The application must support the concurrent processing of 5,000 video streams at 1080p resolution without introducing jitter exceeding 30ms.
Upon receiving a 'Delete Account' request, the system must anonymize all personal data in the relational database and issue a deletion command to the analytics data lake.
The password policy must enforce a minimum length of 12 characters, requiring a mix of uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special symbols, and must reject common dictionary words.
The notification service shall aggregate multiple alerts of the same type occurring within a 5-minute window into a single summary email to prevent user fatigue.
The system must be compatible with the last three major versions of Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge browsers on both desktop and mobile viewports.
When a user attempts to access a restricted resource, the authorization middleware must verify that the user possesses the specific 'read:admin' scope in their JWT.
The disaster recovery site must be geographically separated from the primary data center by at least 500 kilometers to mitigate regional risks.
The reporting module shall allow users to schedule recurring exports of dashboard data to PDF format, to be delivered via email on the first Monday of every month.
The application must handle input validation on both the client and server sides to prevent SQL injection and Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) attacks.
If the vehicle's speed exceeds the recognized speed limit by 10%, the onboard telematics unit must log an 'Over-Speed' event and transmit it to the fleet management server.
The system must provide localized user interfaces for English, Spanish, French, and German, automatically selecting the language based on the user's browser settings.
The chatbot must identify the user's intent from natural language input and route the conversation to a human agent if the sentiment analysis score is negative (< -0.5).
The database schema must be normalized to Third Normal Form (3NF) to reduce data redundancy, except for specific read-heavy tables used for analytics.
The scheduling algorithm shall automatically assign shifts to employees while respecting their availability constraints and ensuring no employee works more than 40 hours a week.
The system must support a peak throughput of 50,000 transactions per second during the Black Friday sales event without error rates exceeding 0.1%.
When the stock price drops by 5% within a 1-hour window, the system shall trigger a 'Stop-Loss' notification to all subscribed users via Push Notification.
The API must implement rate limiting based on the user's subscription tier, allowing 100 requests/minute for 'Free' users and 1000 requests/minute for 'Pro' users.
The content management system shall allow editors to restore previous versions of a page content from a history log maintained for the last 50 revisions.
The application must ensure data consistency across distributed nodes using a quorum-based consensus algorithm like Raft or Paxos.
If the biometric scanner fails to identify the user after three attempts, the system shall disable biometric login and require the master password.
The software must not depend on any proprietary libraries that would restrict its distribution under the MIT open-source license.
The payroll system shall calculate overtime pay at 1.5x the standard rate for any hours worked beyond 8 hours in a single day, accounting for public holidays.
The Docker container startup time must be less than 2 seconds to ensure rapid autoscaling during traffic spikes.
When a shipment is marked as 'Delivered' by the carrier API, the system must update the order status to 'Completed' and trigger a request for user feedback.
The system must undergo a third-party penetration test annually, and all critical vulnerabilities (CVSS > 7.0) must be remediated within 7 days.
The analytics engine shall calculate the Customer Lifetime Value (CLV) in real-time by aggregating transaction history, support costs, and engagement metrics.
The application logs must not contain any sensitive information such as passwords, credit card numbers, or API keys, even in debug mode.
The machine learning pipeline must automatically trigger a model retraining sequence if the concept drift metric exceeds the threshold of 0.05 for three consecutive evaluation windows.
The system must ensure that the Time to First Byte (TTFB) is less than 200ms for 95% of users accessing the content delivery network from North America.
When a recurring subscription payment fails, the billing system shall automatically retry the charge on days 3, 7, and 14 before suspending the user account and sending a termination email.
The user interface must support dynamic font scaling up to 200% without breaking the layout or overlapping text containers, ensuring compliance with accessibility standards.
If the warehouse robot encounters an obstacle within 0.5 meters, it must halt movement immediately, calculate a new path using the A* algorithm, and emit a warning signal.
The application executable code must be signed with a valid Code Signing Certificate to prevent operating system security warnings during installation.
The fraud detection engine shall flag any user account that accesses the platform from three different countries within a 6-hour window.
The database backups must be encrypted using 4096-bit RSA keys and stored in an immutable S3 Object Lock bucket for a retention period of 365 days.
Upon receipt of a 'force_logout' socket event, the client application must clear all local storage tokens and redirect the user to the login screen within 500ms.
The system must support a concurrent connection limit of 100,000 WebSockets per server node while maintaining a CPU usage below 70%.
The payroll module shall automatically deduct the appropriate federal and state taxes based on the employee's w4 form configuration and current tax bracket tables.
The API must implement versioning via the URL path (e.g., /v1/, /v2/) and maintain support for the previous version for at least 12 months after a deprecation notice.
When a user scans a QR code, the mobile app must validate the embedded token signature against the public key before displaying the associated augmented reality content.
The log aggregation service must ingest up to 1GB of log data per minute with a maximum ingestion latency of 5 seconds.
If the external weather API is unreachable, the irrigation control system shall default to the 'standard watering schedule' stored in its local non-volatile memory.
The software must compile and run on both x86_64 and ARM64 architectures without conditional compilation flags in the business logic modules.
The chat application shall implement end-to-end encryption using the Signal Protocol, ensuring that message content is undecipherable by the server.
The recovery time from a complete cluster failure must not exceed 10 minutes, assuming the availability of a warm standby environment.
When a stock SKU is marked as 'obsolete', the system must prevent new purchase orders for that item but allow sales of existing inventory until depletion.
The web application must score at least 90/100 on Google Lighthouse performance audits for both mobile and desktop categories.
The system shall generate a unique, collision-resistant UUIDv4 for every new transaction record inserted into the ledger.
The microservices architecture must ensure that no single service has a cyclomatic complexity greater than 15 to facilitate maintainability.
If the user's credit score is below 600, the loan origination system must automatically route the application to the 'High Risk' manual review queue.
The platform must support Single Sign-On (SSO) integration with Okta, Azure AD, and Google Workspace using the SAML 2.0 standard.
The video transcoding service shall automatically convert uploaded raw files into H.264, H.265, and VP9 formats at multiple bitrates.
The application memory footprint must not exceed 512MB on the client device to prevent background process termination by the OS.
When the vehicle battery level drops below 15%, the onboard computer must automatically switch to 'Eco Mode', limiting top speed to 60mph and reducing AC output.
The system documentation must include a comprehensive Entity Relationship Diagram (ERD) and API reference updated automatically via CI/CD pipelines.
The leaderboard service shall update user rankings in real-time using a Redis sorted set, ensuring the top 100 players are accurate within 1 second of a score change.
The mobile application must request the minimum necessary permissions and must not crash if the user denies access to the camera or microphone.
If a transaction involves a currency conversion, the system must fetch the real-time exchange rate from the forex provider and apply a configurable spread margin.
The solution must be compliant with HIPAA regulations regarding the storage and transmission of Protected Health Information (PHI).
The email dispatch service shall throttle outgoing messages to 50 per second per domain to avoid being blacklisted by spam filters.
The application must maintain a crash-free session rate of 99.9% across all supported Android devices.
When a pull request is merged into the 'main' branch, the CI pipeline must automatically deploy the artifact to the staging environment and run integration tests.
The user password database must use a slow hashing algorithm like Argon2 or Bcrypt with a work factor of at least 10 to resist brute-force attacks.
The flight booking engine shall lock the selected seat for 10 minutes during the checkout process and release it if payment is not confirmed.
The system must provide an audit trail of all administrative actions, including the IP address, timestamp, and specific changes made to the configuration.
If the IoT sensor reports data outside the defined safety range, the edge gateway must trigger a local alarm even if internet connectivity is lost.
The application must be localized for the Japanese market, including correct date formatting (YYYY-MM-DD) and support for Kanji characters.
The search engine shall support fuzzy string matching to return relevant results even if the user makes a typo (e.g., 'iphne' -> 'iphone').
The REST API response payload must be compressed using GZIP if the client request header includes 'Accept-Encoding: gzip'.
When a user blocks another user, the system must prevent any future direct messages, profile views, or notifications between the two accounts.
The software update mechanism must verify the checksum of the downloaded package before initiating the installation process.
The smart thermostat shall learn the user's temperature preferences over a 7-day period and automatically generate a schedule to optimize energy usage.
The system must comply with the 'Right to be Forgotten' (GDPR), allowing users to permanently delete all their data within 30 days of a request.
If the user selects 'Express Shipping', the system must verify that the delivery address is within the serviceable zones for overnight carriers.
The code must adhere to the PEP 8 style guide for Python, enforced by the 'flake8' linter during the build process.
The inventory system shall trigger a webhook notification to the supplier's ERP system whenever a bulk order exceeds 500 units.
The application loading animation must not last longer than 3 seconds before displaying the first interactive element (First Contentful Paint).
The system must utilize an optimistic locking mechanism to prevent data overwrite collisions during simultaneous multi-user edits on the same document record.
The API response time for the main dashboard load must remain under 200ms for the 95th percentile of requests up to a load of 10,000 concurrent users.
The payment gateway must automatically retry failed transactions exactly three times using an exponential backoff strategy before marking the transaction as failed.
All data at rest within the database must be encrypted using AES-256 standards with rotating keys managed by a hardware security module (HSM).
The recommendation engine must dynamically re-rank product suggestions based on the user's clickstream data from the current session within 500ms.
The system shall comply with WCAG 2.1 Level AA standards to ensure accessibility for users utilizing screen readers and assistive technologies.
Upon detecting a suspicious login attempt from a new IP address, the system must trigger a multi-factor authentication challenge and log the event in the security audit trail.
The application architecture must be loosely coupled to ensure that a critical failure in the reporting microservice does not impact the availability of the checkout process.
The system must support the ingestion of 1 million IoT sensor data points per minute without data loss or significant latency spikes.
The reporting module must allow users to define custom SQL-like queries through a visual builder to generate ad-hoc reports on historical data.
Recovery Point Objective (RPO) must be less than 5 minutes requiring continuous transaction log shipping to the disaster recovery site.
The AI model must achieve a minimum F1-score of 0.85 when classifying customer sentiment from unstructured support ticket text.
The inventory system must trigger an automatic purchase order via EDI when stock levels for any SKU fall below the dynamic reorder point calculated by the demand forecasting algorithm.
The mobile application binary size must not exceed 50MB to ensure downloadability over low-bandwidth cellular networks in target emerging markets.
The system must maintain an audit log of every change made to patient health records including the timestamp user ID old value and new value.
The platform must support multi-tenancy where each tenant's data is logically isolated and invisible to other tenants sharing the same database infrastructure.
Users must be able to configure cascading delete rules to ensure referential integrity when removing parent entities with associated child records.
The CI/CD pipeline must automatically reject any build that decreases code coverage below the 80% threshold.
The search algorithm must support fuzzy matching and phonetic analysis to return relevant results even when search terms contain typographical errors.
The system must allow administrators to impersonate a user session for debugging purposes without requiring the user's password while logging the impersonation event.
The codebase must strictly adhere to the PEP 8 style guide for Python code to ensure maintainability and readability across the development team.
The application must automatically purge temporary session data and cache files older than 24 hours to prevent storage bloat.
The video streaming service must dynamically adjust the bitrate (ABR) based on the user's available bandwidth to prevent buffering during playback.
The system must support internationalization (i18n) enabling the UI to render dates currencies and text direction (RTL) based on the user's locale.
When a user uploads a file, the system must asynchronously process the file for virus scanning and metadata extraction before making it available for download.
The database schema must be normalized to Third Normal Form (3NF) to reduce data redundancy, except for specific read-heavy reporting tables.
The system must implement a rate-limiting algorithm that restricts API consumers to 100 requests per minute per API key.
The User Interface must remain responsive and functional across all viewports ranging from 320px mobile screens to 4k desktop monitors.
The system must integrate with the HRIS via LDAP to automatically provision and de-provision user accounts based on employment status updates.
The neural network inference time on the edge device must not exceed 100ms to ensure real-time object detection in the video feed.
The scheduler must account for timezone differences and daylight saving time transitions when processing recurring calendar events across global regions.
The application must survive a complete Availability Zone failure in AWS without manual intervention and with zero downtime.
The shopping cart must persist items for 30 days across different devices if the user is logged in even if the session expires.
The system must validate all inputs against a strict allowlist of characters to prevent SQL injection and Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) attacks.
Legacy data migration scripts must verify data integrity by comparing hash sums of the source and destination records after transfer.
The application startup time after a cold reboot must be less than 15 seconds including database connection establishment.
The workflow engine must allow users to define conditional branching logic where the next step depends on the value of a specific form field.
All third-party library dependencies must be scanned for known vulnerabilities (CVEs) during the build process and block deployment if critical issues are found.
The system must provide a sandbox environment that mirrors the production environment configuration for safe testing of API integrations.
The chat module must use WebSockets to deliver messages in real-time and provide read receipts when the recipient views the message.
The software must be compatible with Docker containers to facilitate orchestration via Kubernetes in a cloud-agnostic environment.
The system must automatically generate a PDF invoice containing the tax breakdown and company branding immediately after payment confirmation.
Password policies must enforce a minimum complexity requiring at least one uppercase letter one number and one special character.
The application must handle the 'Thundering Herd' problem by adding random jitter to the reconnection attempts of disconnected clients.
The geospatial module must calculate the shortest driving route between two coordinates considering real-time traffic data and road closures.
The system must ensure eventual consistency across distributed nodes within a maximum of 2 seconds for non-critical data updates.
Users must be able to roll back to any previous version of a document within the last 90 days preserving all metadata.
The application must use OAuth 2.0 / OpenID Connect for delegating authorization to external identity providers like Google or Azure AD.
The batch processing job must process 50,000 records within a 2-hour maintenance window during off-peak hours.
The system must allow users to define custom webhook endpoints to receive JSON payloads whenever a specific trigger event occurs.
System must automatically scale resources during peak loads to maintain response time under 2 seconds
System must encrypt all sensitive data at rest using AES-256 encryption
System must validate user identities using multi-factor authentication before granting access
System must maintain 99.99% uptime availability throughout the year
System must detect and block suspicious login attempts using anomaly-based detection
System must process up to 50
functional_yes_no: 000 concurrent user requests without performance degradation
